title: Anyone else feel burned out from the new ISA system?
content:
Not sure if this is also due to the added stress of placements/internships but it's a shame that I went from "let's try my best no matter what" to "what's the point of even attending classes" and no amount of breaks seem to help. Days just seem to pass by now.

Anyone else feels so? How on earth is everyone coping with this bs....

comments.body: i feel your pain bro, even i feel exhausted nowadays but i have no other option so somehow i cope up with it.
Same for me bro .....only good thing is 3 more months of this crap and then I will fuck off
